name: TherapyCharts
tag_list: mental-health, psychology, treatment-planning, software, ehr, electronic-health-record, emr, progress-notes, hipaa, hitech, clinical, social-worker, therapist, counselor, web-based, practice-management, records, charts, health, mental-health-workflow, psy
overview:
TherapyCharts is an online mental health treatment planning EHR for psychology. TherapyCharts psychology focused work-flow helps solo and small practice psychologists stay on top of psychology best practices and insurance reporting requirements without the distraction of medical work-flow EHR systems.

The pitch to psychologists: provide better care, save time and money, secure your records.

The TherapyCharts online SaaS solution relieves psychologists of the cost and hassle of periodic software installations and upgrades, network upkeep, and patient record storage and maintenance. Because TherapyCharts features a psychology focused work-flow, all the information a psychologist needs is usually within one to three clicks away. Other mental Health EHR systems sell Psychologists (i.e. non-medical mental health practitioners) the same EHR system that they sell to Psychiatrists (i.e. medical mental health practitioners). However, workflow, best practices, and insurance requirements are not the same for Psychologists as they are for Psychiatrists.

TherapyCharts differentiates itself from other Mental Health EHR treatment planning systems in the following ways:

-TherapyCharts features an innovative web-based computer authorization system that allows therapists to access and work with patient records from any computer within minutes, without sacrificing HIPAA security.

-TherapyCharts psychology focused work-flow clears away the clutter of medical based EHR. All the information a psychologist needs is usually within one or two clicks away.

-TherapyCharts web based (SaaS) system reduces cost and hassle of installed based systems Psychology best practice standards are built-in and automatically kept up-to-date online

-Insurance compliance standards are built-in and automatically kept up-to-date online

  • Simple flat rate affordable pricing
